QuestData.Title: Flames of the Void
QuestData.Description: Do you see the violent black and white flames erupting all around the temple?$B$BThe greater our doubt, the stronger they rage. Unchecked, they will devour the entire temple.$B$BWe have but one hope.$B$BTake flight on one of our war serpents. Fly it near the pure springs of water, and then douse the fires with water from the pools.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fly your War Serpent near Pure Water Springs, then douse 6 Void Flames with the water carried in its mouth.
